text: Cuatro Torres Business Area is a place in Madrid. "Cuatro Torres" is Spanish. It means "Four Towers" in English. Four skyscrapers were built here between 2006 and 2009. Each building is about 250 m tall. They are the tallest buildings in Spain. ==Skyscrapers== * Torre Caja Madrid * Torre de Cristal * Torre Sacyr Vallehermoso * Torre Espacio Category:Madrid Category:2000s establishments in Spain
title: Cuatro Torres Business Area
